artist: Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Engraver: William Leader
description: Samson with long curly hair and elaborate dress, gesturing with right hand at man leaning out of window at right
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

Below image in black: Rembrandt pinx\'t   Wm. Leader Sculp / Samson in the Prison House at Gaza / Engraved from a drawing after an Original Picture of Rembrandt in the Collection of ye King of Prussia / Printed for Carringron Bowles in St. Paul\'s Church Yard London 1765 | In image right on pillar: Rembrandt fecit 1675 | in image in pencil: 2-275
title: Samson in the Prison House at Gaza
